name: Medieval Thief VR
description:
Immerse yourself in the enchanted world of Medieval Thieves, an epic VR adventure that will take you to a thief's battle with soldiers. You will immerse yourself in a meticulously built medieval city where danger lurks around every corner.

With stunning virtual reality visuals, the game offers an unparalleled level of immersion. Put on your VR headset and play as a master thief, outsmarting clever guards as you make your way through intricately designed castles.

Key Features:
- Thrilling VR RPG gameplay: Experience the thrill of being a warrior. Use bows and swords flexibly to take down enemies.
- Complex level design: Fight in a straight line with minions. With a building design of medieval style buildings and dense trees

Are you ready to embark on an unforgettable adventure as the Medieval Thief? Download now and unleash your inner rogue!
